meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Diane McCain Kevin Conway Joel Davidman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #21.

td.p: Diane McCain, a student from Van Nuys, California
Kevin Conway, a computer marketing representative originally from Detroit, Michigan
Joel Davidman, an investment banker from Encino, California
